hooks.command: file=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); if echo "$file" | grep -qE '\.(java|kt|gradle)$'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && ./gradlew spotlessApply -q 2>/dev/null; fi; exit 0

file=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); if echo "$file" | grep -q '\.java$'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && module=$(echo "$file" | sed -n 's|.*/\(brane-[^/]*\)/.*|:\1|p'); if [ -n "$module" ]; then ./gradlew ${module}:compileJava -q 2>&1; fi; fi; exit 0

file=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); if echo "$file" | grep -q '\.java$' && echo "$file" | grep -q '/src/main/' && ! echo "$file" | grep -q 'Test\.java$'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && ./.claude/scripts/suggest_tests.sh "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi; exit 0

file=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); content=$(jq -r '.tool_input.content'); if echo "$file" | grep -q '\.java$' && ! echo "$file" | grep -q 'internal' && echo "$content" | grep -q 'public class\|public interface\|public record\|public enum' && ! echo "$content" | grep -q '@since'; then echo '{"systemMessage": "Reminder: Public types need @since 0.1.0-alpha tag in Javadoc"}'; fi; exit 0

cmd=$(jq -r '.tool_input.command'); if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE '^git commit'; then echo '{"systemMessage": "Tip: Run ./.claude/scripts/pre_commit_check.sh before committing to verify affected tests pass."}'; fi; exit 0
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | grep -qE 'gradle-wrapper\.properties|java\.license|deploy\.yml' && { echo 'Protected file - please confirm with user before modifying' >&2; exit 2; } || exit 0
